==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|ふく|がい}}

===Etymology===
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=ふくがい}} {{m|zh|覆蓋|tr=phjuwk kaj<sup>H</sup>|lit=cover + lid}}. Compare modern {{etyl|yue|-}} reading ''fuk<sup>1</sup> goi<sup>3</sup>''.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=o|ふくがい|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|ふくがい}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=ふくがい|rare}} the act of [[covering]]
# {{lb|ja|sort=ふくがい|rare}} a [[covering]], something that [[cover]]s

====Synonyms====
* {{sense|covering, in general}} {{ja-r|覆い|おおい}}, {{ja-r|被覆|ひふく}}
* {{sense|bed covering}} {{ja-r|上掛け|うわがけ}}
* {{sense|a lid}} {{ja-r|蓋|ふた}}

====Usage notes====
Rarely used. The synonyms are much more common.

===Verb===
{{ja-verb-suru|ふくがい|tr=transitive}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=ふくがい|rare}} to [[cover]] something, to [[cover up|cover]] something [[cover up|up]]

====Conjugation====
{{ja-suru|ふくがい}}

====Synonyms====
* {{ja-r|覆い被せる|おおいかぶせる}}

====Usage notes====
Rarely used. The synonym {{ja-r|覆い被せる|おおいかぶせる}} is much more common.
